description: Grants permission to obtain an Amazon S3 presigned URL to download an attachment.

parameters.name: caseId
parameters.description: Required element for GetCaseAttachmentDownloadUrl to identify the case ID for downloading an attachment from.

parameters.name: attachmentId
parameters.description: Required element for GetCaseAttachmentDownloadUrl to identify the attachment ID for downloading an attachment.

nested_items.name: attachmentPresignedUrl
nested_items.description: Response element providing the Amazon S3 presigned URL to download an attachment.
